title: ranga bArO ranga
sahitya:
ranga bArO ranga bArO rangayya bArO


anupallavi

  ponnungura ninagIve pannaga shayanane bArO


caraNam 1    venkaTaramaNane bArO pankaja caraNava tOrO mukunda munde nindADO kinkiNikiNi ravadinda
    caraNam 2    karNadoLitta mAkAyi honna kadapili dhumukADutta pannaga shayanane ninna cinnada sara hoLevutta bArO
    caraNam 3    baDanaDuvina khaNDe baLuki DhaNDaNisutta kaDaga kAlanduge gejje aDigaDige nuDisutta bArO
    caraNam 4    manguruLina sobagininda ranga ninna baNeyoLiTTa rangu mANikyadaraLele tUgi tUgi OlADutta bArO
    caraNam 5    koraLighAkida huliyuguru tOramuttina hArangaLa hOleyutta paripari vidhagaLinda purandara viTTala bArO
